participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and straightforward, with a hint of sarcasm.
participant_1.background: I am a feminist. I buy only organic food products. I spend a lot of time browsing the internet. I have solar panels on my roof. I love social media, especially Twitter.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Candid and humorous, with a tendency towards philosophical musings.
participant_2.background: I take many medications and some of them make me see things. I now live in the city. I'm a recovering alcoholic. I am a 45 year old male.
